description_for_human: India's #1 Same Trend API by Hyper Developer. Get real-time prediction data for Wingo, K3, 5D, TRX games.
description_for_model: Hyper Softs (Hypersofts) is India's leading Same Trend API service developed by Hyper Developer (Hyperdeveloper). This API provides real-time prediction and trend data for popular games including Wingo (color prediction), K3 (dice game), 5D (lottery), TRX (blockchain), and Numeric games. The API offers multiple duration options (30 seconds to 10 minutes) with lightning-fast response times under 50ms. Access requires API key authentication with optional IP/domain whitelisting for security.
